drupalNodeEvent.title: US-China Cyber Conflicts: TikTok, WeChat, and Sino-American Relations Today

field_speakers.processed: James Katz, Min Ye, Lei Guo, Jack Weinstein, Eugenio Menegon

field_organizers.processed: Boston University Center for the Study of Asia

field_description.processed: The theme of BUCSA for 2020-21 is DIGITAL ASIA,  and we open our year with a roundtable of BU experts on a hot topic, the planned banning of Chinese apps Tik Tok and Wechat in the United States, and what will be the impact on users in the USA and China (including many students, faculty, staff and their families at BU and beyond), and on the political, economic, social and cybersecurity relations between the two countries.
